subject: Request for Deletion of Personal Data
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is Rakib HASAN, and I am writing to formally request the deletion of my personal data that your organization may hold, in accordance with the applicable data protection regulations, including GDPR and CCPA.

I acknowledge that I have provided my personal information through your website while engaging with your services. For your reference, my account identifiers are as follows:

- Full Name: Rakib HASAN
- Location: DHAKA, Bangladesh

I request that you confirm the deletion of my personal data within the next 30 days as stipulated by applicable legislation. Please let me know if you require any additional information to process this request.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response.

Sincerely,
Rakib HASAN
